brief.brief: Determines whether to display the Reset option to the operator.
If the condition is true, the operator can use the reset option to delete all records in the table.
Warning: A reset deletes all records from the current database table. Make this option unavailable to most users.
Set the value of the field to false and change it to true only when you need to delete all records from a table.
